column2: "I'm surprised that you haven't given up, Xion. It's not like you to waste your energy on futile endeavors."
"I have Oracle, and all of ARKS, within my grasp. Even you cannot escape me..."
"Nothing in this world is futile. You were the one who taught me that."
"Well, I suppose I don't mind. A few irregularities here and there will certainly make things more interesting."
"I intend to savour the process of crushing them. Time is a privilege granted to the immortal, after all."
"It seems you're picking up quite a reputation. Your name has been turning up all over my reports."
"You may do as you please, as long as you don't get in my way. Watching you struggle helps to break up the ennui."
"When one has lived for almost an eternity, one sometimes requires a little stimulation. I'm sure you two would agree?"
"Luther is no longer human. However, you should not forget that he was once a man like any other."
"...He gets carried away. When he was human, he feared boredom above all else."
"It was both his greatest strength and his greatest weakness. It would be wise to take advantage of that."
"That is what I would do, and we have concluded the same. That conclusion should not be in error."
"You should continue as you believe you must. The path is born in front of you. This is what everyone wishes."
